Package BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class ChannelBESA

java.lang.Object
BESA.Kernel.Agent.ChannelBESA
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public final class ChannelBESA extends Object implements Runnable
This class represents a channel associated to a BESA agent.
Since:
JDK1.0
Version:
2.0, 11/01/11
Author:
SIDRe - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Takina - Pontificia Universidad Javeriana

      Specified by:

    • findPort

      protected final PortBESA findPort(GuardBESA guard)
      Looks for the associated port a guard.
      Parameters:
      guard - Guard on who the port will look for.
      Returns:
      The found PortBESA.

    • addPort

      protected final PortBESA addPort(GuardBESA guard)
      Creates a port associated to the guard and inserts it in the ports vector. Verifies that a port for this guard has not been created previously.
      Parameters:
      guard - Guard to which the created port will be associated.
      Returns:
      The created port.

    • removePort

      protected final boolean removePort(GuardBESA guard)
      Eliminates a guard associated port. In order to eliminate the port first verifies that has been created a port for this guard and finally is made the elimination of the port.
      Parameters:
      guard - Guard associated to the port.
      Returns:
      true if the port is removed; false otherwise.

    • purgePorts

      protected final void purgePorts(BehaviorBESA beh)
      Eliminates the behavior of the ports in which it appears associate.
      Parameters:
      beh - The behavior to refer.

    • getPorts

      protected final ArrayList getPorts()
      Obtains the listing of ports associated to a channel.
      Returns:
      The list of ports.

      Returns the messages box associated to the channel.
      Returns:
      The MBox associated.

    • findPort

      Looks for the associated port to an event related by its guard.
      Parameters:
      evType - Event of reference for the search..
      Returns:
      The found PortBESA.
